评论详情: The straps bend easily so if you put alot in it it will fall off your shoulder but it is cute
When i unwrapped and took it from packaging, I was in awe. Soft suede pretty bag,  I love it!

I purchased this for work and it is the perfect size. I love the fact that it has zipper so that my things will not go flying out. It is big enough for me to keep my kindle in it as well as my small journal. The only problem I have with this bag is the straps. The material is too flimsy that it does not stay put and I can see that the material will mess up over time.
I really like this bag. Fits all my accessories. Thank You 😄
Nice tote bag.  Fits lots of things.

评论概述: Color, Design, Space: The Triple Appeal of My Favorite Bag
评论详情: I find this bag incredibly attractive, and it has been my constant companion for some time now. Despite not being a high end purse, it seems to captivate people. I'm particularly fond of its color and design, which add a distinctive touch to my outfit. The bag offers ample space for my belongings, which is a practical advantage.
This is a nice handbag. Its a little smaller than I’m used to but still big enough to take my essentials and then some when i go out. The brown is a nice deep brown. Im happy with this handbag.

Rich chocolate beown color. Nice soft Suede Material. Straps are half gold colored chain and half faux leather. Has one small pocket inside. One main zipper. No oomph just your daily handbag purse. Quite spacious. Cant beat the price at 17 bucks. Can be a gift basket stuffer too.

This  tote bags are made by good quality Corduroy, super sturdy, and soft. I was surprised this is water-washable. This bag looks great for any occasions, business and casual outfits  A Beautiful bag and I can put pretty enough items, big enough for me.  Great price. like it.

I ordered this purse to match with my cowgirl boots and they’re almost the perfect color match so I was super excited about that. This purse is made of a different material than I had anticipated though it does state it is made of corduroy so Im not sure what I was expecting it to be. Nevertheless the fabric is soft and very smooth. Medium thickness. Nice lightweight tote bag. Inside it has the big main compartment with one small open side pocket. The shoulder strap feels comfortable and seems well made. The gold chain hoops on each side give it the perfect touch of classiness in my opinion. This tote bag is a nice average/medium size and I think it’s a really good value for money. It comes in three different colors so you can choose the one that fits you best. My one and only issue and really it is a personal preference I suppose more than anything, is that I am not a fan of how the zipper is made on this purse. I mean the zipper works well don’t get me wrong but if you look at my photos above you can see the zipper is only made to cover 3/4 of the opening. It just stops short at the last quarter of the bag and I’m really not sure if it’s supposed to be this way or if the zipper on the purse I received was sewn incorrectly,.. I just can’t understand why it wouldn’t be sewn across the entirety of the opening. The length of the zipper would match the length of the top opening too, but instead it is made to hang 1/4 over the one side and stops 1/4 short of covering the entire opening on the other side. Again I can’t make sense of it and personally I rather it be covering the opening completely and not hang over the side at all but this is the way it seems it was made for some reason. Someone else might like the zipper the way it is or maybe even understand why it is made this way but in my opinion I thought it was a little odd. Overall I still think it’s a really nice purse though.
But strings left dangling from sewn spots on purse. Not a cross body type purse. Short shoulder strap, one inner pocket, short zipper doesn't zip end to end of purse.

I love this Small Satchel Bag! The material is soft and the hardware chain handle is stylish.  The bag is quite roomy and has a handy pocket and zipper top.  The bag style seems retro yet modern.  Perfect size for daily use!

评论概述: Suede look and feel that has a positive vibe
评论详情: It feels nice  to carry this purse with me. Its really soft yet durable. The gold colored chains for the handles give it a stylish notch. Its both casual and dress, with ample room inside the purse. It is easy to carry and soft on the shoulders, the handles are just the right size for the season...not winter! The shoulder bag looks great on me. Its a bag for casual weekends out with the girls for lunch or to shop. A few compliments from other women about the bag but nothing overboard. I would recommend it to anyone looking for style at a reasonable price

Pay attention to the size as this bag is on the smaller end (11.8"x 4.5"x 10.8"). It also has a very short strap. It was too small for me to wear on my shoulder, so it is a carrying bag.  With that being said, it is really soft and nice. I love the feel of the fabric. It looks really nice too. It would be great for carrying a notebook, folder, and a few other small things back and forth to work. I like the bag, it just did not suit my particular needs.

评论概述: A little smaller than I like......
评论详情: I was super excited to get this! And, don't get me wrong, I'm still excited, but a little let down at the same time. The sizing is a little smaller than I would like. However, I will still be using this one and often. It has a soft, suede like feel to the material. The brown coloring is a neutral color and I love it! It does hold a good bit of items, but I can't fit my iPad into as I would like, so that's why a little lower rating. But, overall I will still enjoy this totebag!

This small tote handbag is soft.  To me it feels like it is made of suede despite being corduroy.  This lends it a brushed material look (vs shiny leather or quilted), that is a dressy casual.  The gold colored chains on the handles further it's dressy casual appeal.  This isn't the bag you bring to a formal event but for a day out shopping or having lunch with friends it is a perfect accessory.There is plenty of room in the bag but despite the "tote" statement it is not so massive you take an extra 10 minutes looking for your wallet.It is a comfortable over the shoulder wear.  The handles aren't very long, so a large winter coat might impede it being worn over the shoulder.

This handbag holds so so much! I went from a purse that was overflowing that was not small but not big enough for all my things. This looks nearly empty after putting all of my things into it. It is really soft and durable too. It is a really beautiful bag that will compliment most any outfit.
Has a suade look to it. Its small and cute. The chain shoulder straps give this bag a little extra charm.

The bag is nice.  The fabric is soft and fuzzy.  The bag is of a good size and the over all construction is fairly good.  The straps are not long.  The bag will fall right above your waist if the straps are put on your shoulder.  The straps are not adjustable.  All in all - a cute purse.
Nice slouchy bag. Good size too. It’s got a very soft feeling and the straps give it just the right amount of something extra!

The gold accents on this bag look so good against the suede-like material. It looks rich. I like that it's a 1 zipper bag. Don't get me wrong, I love pockets, but sometimes I just want a simple bag that doesn't have a gazillion compartments. This looks great and fits everything. Great price too!

I kind of love this purse.  It’s a fake suede, but with the chain on the handle it looks more expensive than it is.  It holds a lot, and feels nice.  I think somewhere in the description it said cross body which it absolutely is not, but looking at the pics I knew it was a shoulder bag.  In any case I do like it, and will enjoy using it.

评论概述: Not as big and sturdy like the listing picture shows
评论详情: I am not impressed with the look and quality of this purse. Based on the listing photo I thought that this purse would be bigger and more structured. But it is floppy and quite small. Also the coloring is off.

I like the look of this bag.  The metal on the handles really looks good to me.  There's plenty of room in the bag to carry a lot.  I like the zipper enclosure so that I know things are not going to slip out.
Looks great, fabric is soft, seams and details are well made, I don’t foresee it falling apart anytime soon. Perfect size and sits well in my shoulder. Good pockets as well.

This tote bag is very stylish and practical. It's made with good-quality corduroy and it's lightweight and durable. The bag is perfect for carrying the essential things you need for an outing. Easy to wash and clean with water. It feels very soft to the touch and It makes a great gift.

This Tote Bag is not a high-end designer bag, but I love it. The size, color, and straps are perfect for me. I needed a lightweight khaki bag for spring at the beach. It even has a zipper closure to keep my belongings secure. The price is reasonable enough that I can order more colors.

First of all, I have to say that this bag looks really nice.  I ordered the dark brown color and I really love the look of the bag.  The material is very soft and the bag itself is pretty spacious.  My favorite part of the bag are the handles, which are very elegant and pretty.  The reason I gave this bag only three stars is because the zipper does not go from edge to edge and close fully.  In other words, once the bag is fully zipped, there are two pretty big holes on each end, which would easily allow for things to fall out if the bag falls over.  I was a little baffled by this concept of the zipper not going all the way to the edge or even closer to the edge and kept trying to fix it and see why it wouldn't close all the way.  I could almost fit my fist through the hole on the end while the bag was fully zipped.  I think if there was no zipper at all and maybe just a button or clasp or if the zipper closed more, then this bag would be a fantastic bag. Overall, though, it is a nice medium size bag.

评论概述: Soft and cute, but smaller at the top that stated
评论详情: I got this bag hoping I could carry papers back and forth from work in it, based on the size it lists. However, in my pic you can see it tapers at the top and has a zipper inside that restricts some of the space usage. That being said, it's very cute. The material is soft and flexible. The handle is stylish. I can fit some papers in, just not as much as it sounded like by the description.
Cute little bag. Stitching slightly off. Very soft.

I was expecting a heavier suede fabric than what arrived, but for the price, I'm not complaining too much. I'm sure my wife will be happy with this when she opens it on this upcoming Christian holiday morning.
